doc.title: Messiah
doc.plot: Journalist Frazer Truick (Craig Fairbrass) investigates the mysterious death of the brother of trainee journalist Rachel Morris (Rowena King). Delving deeper, Truick becomes convinced that the tragedy was murder, committed by a pagan cult led by nationalist politician David Keller (Jon Finch). But as the evidence unfolds, things take on a more sinister and potentially lethal significance as Truick becomes embroiled in devil worship, witchcraft and ultimately human sacrifice!
